emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group of high school students, including in foreground from left: Camillia Kwolek, Annette McCants, and Ross Green, taking test at Carnegie Institute of Technology
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 29, 1958, pg. 3 reads: "Exceptionally Able Seniors - Four hundred and forty-six senior high school students from 46 high schools in Allegheny County took exceptionally able youth tests last Saturday morning at Carnegie Institute of Technology. The able youth tests, initiated in 1916, are sponsored by the Civic Club of Allegheny County.  Shown in the foreground of a crowded classroom are, left to right: Camillia Kwolek, Annette McCants and Ross Green. - Harris Photo."
